post.title: bnib iphone 4 32gb sealed *factory unlocked*
post.content: i'm selling a brand new iphone4 32gb sealed factory unlocked. i have the receipt to prove that this was purchased at apple store at launch day. this is a factory unlocked and can use any wireless carriers or international. cash only. i'm willing to meet at markham, richmond hill, or scarborough. picture upon request. asking for $980
